name: Flotus
description:
Play with the ball is always so fun and exciting! Besides the fun in this game you must to think carefully.
You must place the ball in a special zone and throw it into the box, selecting the perfect trajectory and force for the throw. But don’t think that everything is so simple. We must take into account the physics of the rebound and overcome all obstacles. On some levels, the way will be partitioned blocks, teleports and other objects will appear, and the box will move.
Show your aptitude, dexterity, knowledge of physics and geometry! Calculate the throw and score a goal!

Features:

- Simple rules: «Score a goal».
- 60 exciting levels-puzzles.
- Mechanics in the style of "Angry Birds".
- Realistic physics of flying and bouncing the ball.
- Minimalistic design and nice soundtrack.
- 500 easy achievements.
